createData.title: Fix webhook verification issue impacting all connectors

- Identify and patch the breaking change

- Notify team once staging is healthy

Add Zendesk Help Center article syncing with incremental behavior.

- Use Zendesk Help Center APIs to fetch articles
- Implement incremental sync via updated_since timestamp
- Convert HTML content to Markdown for indexing

operations.reasoning: Chandler committed to expanding connector health-check coverage and surfacing status in the admin UI. Clear coding task.

createData.title: Expand connector health-check coverage and surface status in admin UI
createData.description:
Broaden health checks and expose connector status in UI.

- Add checks for configuration errors, auth errors, and edge cases
- Implement UI indicators showing connector health
- Add reconnect actions for failed connectors
- Incrementally expand coverage across all connectors

Build the Attio CRM connector integration.

- Implement Attio API integration

linearState.title: Implement Trello incremental scraping
linearState.description:
Replace unreliable Trello webhooks with incremental scraping for data sync.

- Implement incremental scrape for Trello data
- Retain only deletion/permission-revocation webhooks for cleanup
- Validate reliability vs previous webhook approach

linearState.title: Migrate connectors to use credentials with connector id namespace

Restructure connector credential storage to use connector ID namespace.

- Migrate existing credentials to new namespace structure
- Update code that reads/writes credentials
